content: bit higher than i did if you actually want to get 8 on the little guy start with magic loop ring row 1 6 single_crochet in magic loop pull tight row 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet repeat around 12 single_crochet row 3 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet row 4 3 single_crochet 1 single_crochet in 2 single_crochet 3 single_crochet 1 single_crochet in 2 single_crochet 8 total finish off the legs and then sew them on the body at your place of choice by not finishing off the row only 8 scs it makes them slanted and they re easier to attach now you re done with the body part you re on your own with the accessories go crazy put it up on ravelry so i can see i love new octopi also did you like this pattern did you know i have a few more out there did you think you d get through this with only one shameless plug of self-promotion wrong http //www bonami etsy com/
